vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.19;
son of: Shemida (H8061);
brother of: Ahian (H0291), Shechem (H7928H) and Likhi (H3949)
§ Aniam = "I am the people" or "lament of people"
a man of Manasseh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Semidá; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿尼安 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "民的哀悼"
一名瑪拿西人 (代上7:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
阿尼安 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "民的哀悼"
一名玛拿西人 (代上7:19)
